overview: You better dress well if you want a shot with Melina Rey, this babe won't put out unless you have some style, but the reward is well worth it! Meanwhile, Leria Glow is heading to her friend's cabin for some peace and quiet where love will come knocking. The sexy Alexa Flexy is also back and looking to make up for a long afternoon of shopping by having her personal shopper help out with her new lingerie. And what for Geishakyd? An exhausting life has left this beauty in need of a chauffeur to drive her around and take her to the heights of pleasure! These are the stories of Private Specials, Elegant Babes, don't miss it!
title: Elegant Babes
